name: Gorba-choo-choo
description:
You are a locomotive engineer trying to drive the Trans-Sibirian Express successfully through the Russian tundra...

But being the only one responsible for everything going down in this passenger packed train, you have to manage and oversee everything in the vehicles. Running back and forth -  jumping wagon to wagon, task to task, the train is slowly wrecking on the way.

How far can you travel? How long will you be able to maintain the train?

Made within 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 at Mediencampus Dieburg, Germany. Released under a Creative Commons license (CC-BY 4.0) according to the GGJ rules.

Credits:
